infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to your health monitoring devices like ET-475, H-Band, and other fitness trackers to collect real health data.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to your health monitoring devices to sync your health data.
